__e: I don't think mourning the death of someone who had been special to you is particularly abnormal!
Page was a woman of great generosity and compassion.
All too young with too many dreams to die. We can no longer hear your musical laughter.
You should be mourning. I know I am.
Walk away, grieve for Scully and then never look back.
What are you, in mourning for your life?
